item.content:encoded:
Stars from pro wrestling and the world of bodybuilding have often crossed paths. WWE even inducted Arnold Schwarzenegger, a bodybuilding legend, into their Hall of Fame. Another bodybuilding legend who held more Mr. Olympia titles than Arnold had his fair share of interaction with WWE superstars.

Ronnie Coleman, who won the Mr. Olympia title 8-times in a row, has often appeared in the media alongside some famous WWE names.

While bodybuilding has seen some of the best muscle men, WWE has had its own share of wrestlers with physiques to boast about. In his prime, WWE star Triple H had a ripe physique and was one of the most well-built wrestlers of his generation.

A rare photo also shows Triple H nearly measuring up to Coleman in terms of biceps size.

Triple H and Ronnie Coleman flex their biceps in a rare photo

Ronnie Coleman had a beefed-up physique and his domination in bodybuilding earned him the nickname ‚ÄòThe King‚Äô.

With his 23-inch biceps, Coleman had some of the biggest arms among athletes worldwide. But a rare photo has resurfaced, which shows the eight-time Mr. Olympia champion with WWE legend Triple H giving fans a chance to compare their biceps.

READ MORE: Rare Photo of Bodybuilding Legend Ronnie Coleman Flexing With WWE Legend Who Had 26-Inch Biceps

Many WWE wrestlers in the past, like Hogan, have matched or even beaten the biceps size of bodybuilders like Arnold and Coleman. In this photo, Triple H can be seen almost matching up to the iconic bodybuilder, which is quite impressive.

And while Coleman is a full-fledged bodybuilder, Triple H gave him a run for his money when comparing biceps. Both Triple H and Coleman have been legends in their industries and inspired a million others across the world.

Interestingly, Triple H was featured in a segment with another bodybuilding legend, Arnold Schwarzenegger, on an episode of SmackDown in 1999. On the show, McMahon presented the “World Box Office Championship” to Arnold, who then laid out Triple H after a few punches.

Coleman’s numerous surgeries

The impressive bodybuilding career of Ronnie Coleman took its toll on him. He has had to deal with many significant injuries to his spine and hip. All these injuries have required extensive surgical procedures and Coleman has gone under the knife 13-times to date.

Moreover, he has had 14 screws, two rods, and two cages fitted inside his body as of today. During these times, he endured many painful moments, including the time when the screws broke inside him four times.

Despite all the surgeries and doctors‚Äô advice, Coleman continues to train regularly in the gym, keeping his body fit, and that is one reason many have so much admiration for him.

item.content:encoded:
Daniel Ricciardo hasn’t had a good stint with McLaren. While the 2021 season was arguably bad, 2022 got worse. But finally, the Honey Badger can breathe a sigh of relief after securing a P5 at the Singapore Grand Prix.

It was all set to be another gloomy evening for Ricciardo. He was starting the race in P16, which is never ideal. But the rain did what rain does best in Formula One. It brought in excitement. From a starting grid of 20 drivers, only 14 finished the race. And for a change, Daniel Ricciardo was on the good side of luck.

Daniel Ricciardo credits teamwork for good results in Singapore

In lap 36, Yuki Tsunoda crashed into the barriers, prompting Safety Car to be deployed. This is when Max Verstappen was lurking behind Lando Norris, who was in P4 at the time. Anticipating that the Safety Car had gone in, Max lunged forward, trying to overtake Norris but quickly locked up as he saw that the flags hadn’t gone green.

With his tires locked up, he went into the run-off area, rejoining the track at P8. Ricciardo took advantage of the situation and got himself into P5, the position he held on till the end of the race.

Ricciardo, acknowledging Lando’s help in pushing Verstappen on a wet patch, said, “Lando forced Max [Verstappen] on the wet patch, that promoted me another position, so it‚Äôs just a big team day. Lots of teamwork!”

The Australian driver, while happy with the result, said that it was kind of “sad” that it took him so long to go as far as P5 this season.

Read More: Daniel Ricciardo‚Äôs Mega Race Goes Under-Appreciated and Fans Are Not Happy

Ricciardo confessed that he wanted to go on slick tires a lot early, but looking at how that turned out for George Russell and Pierre Gasly, he was glad to have been patient.

Ricciardo on a P4-P5 finish for McLaren at the 2022 Singapore Grand Prix

Despite being in a jolly mood after securing his season’s best finish so far, Ricciardo said that he was very tired and sleepy after a physically and mentally challanging race.

Ricciardo reacted to the 4th and 5th finish for the team. He said, “I’m very happy to finally get back in there, just a good one for the team as well. 4th and 5th… happy to pull off a good day.”

Watch This Story: Spectacular F1 Helmet Designs at 2022 Miami GP Ft. Daniel Ricciardo & Lando Norris

Daniel Ricciardo looks to be gaining momentum. Will he regret parting ways with McLaren at the end of the season? Time will tell.

item.content:encoded:
WWE‚Äôs plans for Brock Lesnar were washed out when The Beast Incarnate decided to leave the company. It was a shock for many WWE officials at the time because Lesnar was minting money for Vince McMahon’s empire.

After leaving WWE, The Conqueror wanted to pursue a football career. Hence, in July 2004, he signed with the NFL team Minnesota Vikings, and started training with the team.

After Brock Lesnar signed with Minnesota Vikings, he gave an interview in which he revealed the reason for pursuing a football career.

Lesnar said, ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt wanna wake up when I was fifty years older or ten years from now kicking myself in the butt saying, ‚ÄòMan I wish I‚Äôd at least grasped onto the opportunity. You don‚Äôt get many opportunities in life and when you do get them, you should grab onto them. So I just thought well if somebody will give me the opportunity.‚Äù

The hectic WWE schedule had frustrated The Beast Incarnate and wanted to leave as soon as possible. Even though WWE offered Lesnar a $45 million contract, he refused to pursue a football career. Moreover, he had signed a $230,000 contract with the Minnesota Vikings.

Read More:- Who Ended Brock Lesnar‚Äôs 503-day WWE Universal Championship Reign?

The former WWE Champion played football in high school before moving to amateur wrestling. Therefore, Lesnar knew the basics of the game and just had to polish his skills on the field.

Lesnar‚Äôs last match of the first stint in 2004 was against Goldberg at WrestleMania 20. The match received a lot of criticism as the news of Lesnar and Goldberg leaving after WrestleMania had upset the fans.

Brock Lesnar shared why was he confident about a football career

The former UFC Heavyweight Champion signed with the Minnesota Vikings in July 2004. He was confident to make it in football as he had previously overcome all odds since his high school days.

The former Universal Champion said, ‚ÄúAnd I‚Äôve been a longshot all my life. I went to high school, I was never a state champion, (and) I never got recruited out of high school for wrestling. I end up with NCAA Champion, I go into the WWE and people say I don‚Äôt have any mic skills, I don‚Äôt have the charisma, I don‚Äôt have what it takes.‚Äù

He added, ‚ÄúAnd here I become the youngest WWE Champion in the history, not only (once) but the three-time. Now I‚Äôm taking this other road and to see if I can make my mark as a football player.‚Äù

However, Lensar‚Äôs football career never went the way he wanted. The Beast played some of the pre-season games, but because of an accident, the Vikings cut off Lesnar from the team. Thus, Brock Lesnar was released in August 2004, two months after he had signed with the Vikings. Despite everything that happened, Lesnar excelled on more battlefields such as UFC and then WWE again, where he still carries on with his eventful run.

item.content:encoded:
Nintendo is undoubtedly one of the biggest franchises in the gaming industry. The company caters to multiple genres, such as creating consoles, developing games, giving shelter to small-time companies, and a lot more.

Nintendo has come a long way in time as it has its roots back in the late 1800s. The company used to produce playing cards, after which it walked into the gaming industry a hundred years later. Since then, the franchise gazed enough audience to become one of the industry leaders in the modern world.

Throughout time, the Japanese giant has pleased fans with a massive library of titles, producing top AAA titles like Mario, The Legend Of Zelda, Splatoon, Pokemon, and a lot more. However, the franchise did not limit itself to making games as it ventured into the amusement park industry with Super Nintendo World. But does that mean that the Japanese took a pit stop? Well, it doesn’t look like it has, as it has now launched its website Nintendo Pictures Co. Ltd.

Nintendo stuns the world by stepping into the cinematic industry with its website

Nintendo stepped into the motion pictures world with its dedicated website Nintendo Pictures. The franchise acquired Dynamo Pictures a few months back, giving it a fresh look for fans. Apparently, the Japanese company bought the franchise to “focus on the development of visual content utilizing Nintendo IP.”

Interestingly, Nintendo aims to educate fans about their characters through video “and to create unique videos that will remain in their memories forever.”

Fans have also appreciated this massive move, as they are eager to see what the franchise has in store. The Japanese maestro has acquired Dynamo Pictures, the powerhouse for top anime like Yuri on Ice, the Pikmin franchise, and the hit movie Earwig and Witch.

item.content:encoded:
Major League Baseball is about to enter the postseason, and eleven teams have already qualified for the playoffs. Therefore, just one spot is left. That spot will likely get filled by the Philadelphia Phillies. But the team, San Francisco Giants, which everyone thought would give a tremendous season this year as well, got eliminated.

The Giants entered this season with the highest expectations after they got more than 100 wins last season. But, in Sunday’s game at Oracle Park, after the Giants lost to the Diamondbacks, they got eliminated from the playoffs. Fans of the team were left disappointed by their team’s struggle this season after a mind-blowing last season with 100+ wins.

The tremendous season of the San Francisco Giants led the fans to high expectations

The Giants are left with less than five games this regular season. However, if the team does not win all of them, they will be making history. Not because of something good but by becoming the 7th team in the history of Major League Baseball to give a losing season after a 100-win season. item.content:encoded:
Michael Jordan took his exit from the court in 2003. After having a stellar NBA career of 15 seasons, His Airness finally called it quits at the age of 40. MJ had earlier announced his retirement twice in 1993 and 1999, but he always found his way back to the court. During his final game with the Washington Wizards, Jordan scored 15 points, four rebounds and four assists against the Philadelphia 76ers. However, the Wizards lost to the Sixers by 107-87.

When Jordan exited the court after fouling, he received standing ovations from the fans and coaches. Even the remaining players on the court, including the opponents, applauded while Jordan basked in the love and respect on his final night as an NBA player. Evidently, MJ put an end to his basketball career as the third-highest total score in the league’s history with 32,292 points. He was only behind NBA legends Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Karl Malone.

READ MORE – Young Lil Wayne Sported Iconic Michael Jordan Jersey Way Before Achieving Stardom in Rare Image

Two years after his retirement, the former Chicago Bulls player launched his book Driven From Within. The book chronicled MJ’s beliefs, his drive to win, and his journey to being one of the greatest basketball players. Additionally, he appeared for an interview and opened up about the sport, his father and much more.

Michael Jordan talks about the state of basketball

During an interview with 60 Minutes, Michael Jordan talked about wanting his life back. After having constantly lived under the spotlight for a long time, MJ expressed his desire to have a more private life now that he has retired. Furthermore, while talking about the sport, Jordan said that the state of basketball was not as good as it used to be. He felt that the new generation of NBA players were being paid more than they deserved, which affected the sport and the players’ ethics.

“The kids today, they are being given things that they haven’t earned. I don’t want to seem like an old-school, traditional, bitter type of guy. You ask me and I’m telling you. I think the game is being cheated because of the success that’s being given prior to them earning it. Simple as that.” said Jordan

Bradley apparently visited Jordan a year earlier, in 2004, in Las Vegas. His Airness was at the four-day long training camp organized by the Michael Jordan Senior Flight School. The camp was for middle-aged people who were given the experience of playing with Michael Jordan, the NBA player. It was evident that age had caught up to him as MJ broke a sweat while playing with amateurs.

item.content:encoded:
Last weekend, Denny Hamlin was extremely annoyed with William Byron. For good reason, too, because the #24 driver spun him off the track during a caution period. Afterward, the NASCAR officials slapped Byron with a penalty, though they did confess that they did not see the incident at first.

Ahead of the Cup race at Talladega, talking to Dale Earnhardt Jr, Hamlin spoke about the conflict between him and Byron.

He said, “I see comments about It’s unfair to him. 25 points, he probably would have made that up in the course of the race it they would have implemented it right away.”

“The problem with that is, I finished 10th. I was second and had to restart 22nd on that restart.”

“So we lost a ton of spots, and we were only able to get back to 10th. NASCAR used all the available evidence they had. Some of that evidence did not come till late, to them.”

WATCH THIS STORY: Denny Hamlin Chooses Violence in Dig at RCR‚Äôs Kyle Busch Announcement After Tyler Reddick Saga

“They’re talking about what they can excuse from video as a live feed on some sort of server to get all the information quicker, that’s an evolution process for them that they need to get better at, and they will get better at.”

What else did Denny Hamlin say about his rival?

In the end, as he mentioned, he could only muster a Top 10 finish. Fortunately, he is still in Playoff contention, and he was able to deliver a better result at Talladega on Sunday.

To be precise, the #11 driver finished in 5th place, behind Chase Elliott, Ryan Blaney, Michael McDowell, and Ross Chastain. It is also interesting to note that he did entertain the idea of enacting immediate revenge.

Hamlin continued. “But I think it was justified, simply because it really altered our race. In a way that we should not be racing, or remotely contacting each other under caution.”

“I’m guilty as well, I wanted to get back after him right away, but calmer heads prevailed when my team was like, ‘Alright, stop it, get back in and let’s go racing'”

READ MORE: ‚ÄúIt Is Kevin Harvick, Chase Elliott & Kyle Larson‚Äù ‚Äì Ross Chastain Slammed for Denny Hamlin Remark; ‚ÄúMouthpiece‚Äù Comments Prove Unpopular Among NASCAR Fans

Now, the next race on the calendar is at the Charlotte Motor Speedway Roval. Earlier this year, the Joe Gibbs Racing driver won the Coca-Cola 600 but has never won at the Roval. Hopefully, for his sake, he is able to carry out that momentum and snatch a win.

item.content:encoded:
What game to start with? What game to play next? Is this one worth the time and space? Questions like these are not foreign to fellow gamers. In fact, they are the ones that are mostly surrounded by such questions. But hopefully, we might just crack the deal for you by bringing forward popular games as per the American gamers.

The selection of video games is no joke. It‚Äôs just like ordering food. Factors like ratings, reviews, day of the week, budget (available memory space in case of video games), and most importantly, mood, affect a person’s choices. And rather than sacrificing hours and hours of research for the next video game. We have here a projection of the most popular video games.

Titles that are popular games amongst gamers

Video games have become a crucial part of the modern world. One can say it is that piece of technology with which the human being interacts avidly. From mobile phones to fully dedicated systems, the gaming world‚Äôs evolution has utilized technology to a great extent.

Read More: Top 10 Horror Games of 2022 That Concurred Sleepless Nights

Moreover, the developing world has seen some of the most riveting games like Super Mario Bros., Call of Duty, and Grand Theft Auto. These games never wear out with time. If anything, they seem to become golden and legendary. Thus, to not take your deliberations much ahead, here is a list of popular video games (Q2 2022):

Mario Kart Deluxe (Switch)

Coming in at tenth rank, Mario Kart Deluxe makes it to the most popular video games list, leaving Super Smash Bros behind. Maybe having the Kart gave it a lead to make the cut. Brought forward by Nintendo, this video game belongs to the racing genre. Where players compete for first place while rocking on the beautiful and powerful karts. Moreover, this was originally introduced for the Wii console and went on to become a banger on the Switch.

Position – 10th
Popularity- 44%

A small note, popularity here is considered as the percentage of people who have a positive opinion of a video game.

Angry Birds

All mobile gamers can rejoice as the puzzle game is one of the most popular games. Developed by Rovio Entertainment, it carries a variety of puzzles, which the players have to solve in a riveting fashion. Through different birds of various abilities, one has to aim and incline their bird’s flight to destroy structures.

Position: 9th
Popularity: 44%

The Legend of Zelda

This Nintendo title encloses a utopian world with spectacular terrain and gorgeous creatures. Moreover, the video game brings forward a wide range of campaign missions, along with contributing side quests. Thus, this high fantasy action adventure has been made possible by the efforts of Nintendo.

Position: 8th
Popularity: 44%

Marvel’s Spider-Man

One of the most loved characters of Marvel got his game in 2018. And since then it has successfully hyped and enthralled the community. With high-definition action and unnerving villains, the game grasps the attention of gamers and entices them with captivating missions. Thus, this joint venture of Insomniac Games and Sony Interactive Entertainment has become one of the most popular video games. And with the latest release on PC, its fame has only skyrocketed.

Position: 7th
Popularity: 45%

Grand Theft Auto

Undoubtedly, this legendary game by Rockstar Games is a popular video game. The game exposes a wide range of open-world gameplay with a touch of an engrossing storyline. In this role-playing video game, gamers have to grind their way through exacting challenges. To become the best in the city. Released in 2013, the game exceeded its potential each year thanks to its online content, which still has its relevance in the current period.

Position: 6th
Popularity: 45%

Mortal Kombat

Projecting the thrill and enticement of arcades, Moral Kombat performs exceptionally well amongst gamers. The game is produced by Midway Games. And since 1992, it has introduced a series of installments to keep gamers engrossed with its gameplay. This seems to have only gotten better with time and technology.

Position: 5th
Popularity: 45%

Candy Crush Saga

Candy Crush Saga has gifted mobile gamers a puzzle game with a unique touch. The proof of this is, it won the People’s Choice Awards for Favorite Mobile Game in 2016. Therefore, the tile-matching video game has made its presence known in the video gaming community. And still flourishes to do so.

Position: 4th
Popularity: 45%

Call of Duty

The first-person shooter game has become one of the most coveted titles in the industry. With its realistic projection of high machinery fights, the game delivers immersive action gameplay. Having a wide range of title series, the game deems to put forward a whole new generation of FPS gaming. And the credit goes to the minds behind its well-built infrastructure.

Position: 3rd
Popularity: 46%

SEGA

Most people would know this video game company through Sonic The Hedgehog and Contra. One can say that the company has earned its recognition by producing fascinating gameplay. That has managed to keep gamers in their seats. And at the same time, they have earned the fruitfulness of their efforts.

Position: 2nd
Popularity: 51%

Super Mario Bros.

Mario!!! Finishing first place is none other than the iconic Mario. Propagating a cheerful and joyful gameplay experience, the arcade video game tops the chart. Carrying thrilling and challenging maps, the game keeps the players on their toes to work through obstacles, earn abilities, and raise the flag in the end. Thus, this Nintendo title rules the most popular video games list.

Position: 1st
Popularity: 62%

You can keep a close eye on developments in rankings here. Moreover, which games from above have you played? And which ones did you like the most? Feel free to tell us in the comments section below.
